description: QMTF files are created when you export data from Quicken. To export the QMTF file select File â†’ Export and choose "Export to Quicken 2007" or "Quicken Mac 2007 Transfer File (QMTF)..." You can then select the date range of the data you want included in the QMTF file.
NOTE: QMTF files are similar to .QIF files, which are also used for transferring financial data in a text format.
